name: Aladino - Cameroon - Queens Perfecto
additionalNotes: The Aladino Cameroon is a line extension of the popular Aladino brand, which is handmade at the JRE Tobacco Company factory in Honduras. It is a medium strength cigar that features a Cameroon-seed wrapper that was grown in the Jamastran Valley in Honduras. The wrapper is carefully aged for two years before it is applied to the Corojo binder and filler. Once lit, the Aladino Cameroon delivers warm notes of spice with an underlying sweetness and creaminess.
